short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DeJa (dee-jay) is a browser extension that helps you control your music remotely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take full control of your music from any device with DeJa (pronounced DeeJay), is the ultimate remote controller for web-based music services like Amazon Music. With DeJa, you can manage your tunes effortlessly, from pausing and playing to skipping tracksâ€”all without being tied to a single device. Designed for music lovers who want seamless access across multiple devices and platforms, DeJa is the perfect tool to keep the music going, wherever you are.

Key Features:
- Remote Control from Anywhere: Play, pause, and skip tracks remotely, no matter which device you're on.
- Multi-Device Sync: Effortlessly add multiple devices
- Multi-View: Display music metadata (including lyrics) on multiple devices at once
- Cross-Platform Compatibility: Use DeJa across platforms (starting with Amazon Music, with more services coming soon).
- Seamless Updates and New Features: Stay up-to-date with new features included in both free and pro versions.
